1370: Boidin was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Gheesen at age 24 in 1370.
Had a son with Gheesen, Hildebrandus, at age 24.
1386: Lost his wife Gheesen while she was giving birth to bertrade in 1386.
1371: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Suaneka, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Linnea, at age 28.
1375: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Beatrice, at age 29.
1376: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Myrthel, at age 30.
1379: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Ymmekine, at age 33.
Lost daughter Ymmekine when Ymmekine was 1 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Nellen, at age 34.
